publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1147 Michael Matheson: Threat to TransBus Plants at Larbert and Camelon-That the Parliament notes with concern the financial problems that the Mayflower Corporation is facing; acknowledges the work done by Falkirk Council, Scottish Enterprise and Mayflower in their proposal to secure 1,000 jobs at the Glenbervie site, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to assist Falkirk Council in protecting the TransBus operation in Falkirk, in order that these highly skilled jobs can be secured and that the long standing manufacture of buses continues in the Falkirk area.
